text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're here at the Arima Kinen, the<n>final race of this year's
Twinkle<n>Series, and the star of the show is the<n>Triple
Crown champion, Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We didn't get our wish to see her<n>take on her sister, Biwa
Hayahide, but<n>she's ready to race for the two of<n>them!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
However, it's also her first mix-up<n>with racers in the senior
year!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Against these top-class veterans, can<n>she win her fifth G1
race and become<n>a Five Crown champion?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Good, looks like you're focused even<n>in a huge race like
this.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't know how long I can keep<n>steady though. My whole
body's<n>aching to run.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide's not here today, so that<n>means all your
opponents will be<n>going after you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide's not here today, so that<n>means all your
opponents will be<n>going after you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But knowing you, that won't be a<n>problem. Go blow
everyone away with<n>some crazy running!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But knowing you, that won't be a<n>problem. Go blow
everyone away with<n>some crazy running!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me twice.<n>They'll find no mercy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe... You made it after all, Narita<n>Brian!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Only the toughest of the tough race in<n>the Arima Kinen. But
I've got my eyes<n>on you alone.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And you better know it's 'cause I<n>think you're the best! So
don't you<n>dare back out of our race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Like I would. You're on, Ama. Give<n>me everything you've
got.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I hope you're ready to have some<n>fun!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The racers are waiting in the gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Will the Triple Crown champion, Narita<n>Brian, win? Or will
another racer finally<n>stop her? Get ready to find out as the<n>
Arima Kinen... begins!
